meta.title: The Residences DIFC | Zabeel District Dubai
meta.description: Invest in The Residences DIFC at Zabeel District. 463 luxury residences by DIFC Developments. 1â€“4BR apartments & duplex penthouses from AED 2.6M. 70/30 payment plan. Handover Q4 2029. Get a free consultation from Dubai market experts!

propertyHero.shareText: Check out The Residences DIFC at Zabeel District, Dubai.
propertyHero.title: The Residences
propertyHero.subtitle: DIFC Zabeel District

description: The Residences DIFC is a landmark luxury development within Zabeel District â€” the ambitious new expansion of Dubai International Financial Centre spanning 7.1 million sq. ft. Developed by DIFC Developments, the project offers 463 freehold residences across two signature towers, ranging from elegant one-bedroom apartments to expansive duplex penthouses with panoramic views of Dubai's skyline.

Set within an AED 100 billion live-work-play ecosystem designed for 125,000+ people, The Residences provide a rare opportunity to own property in one of the world's most advanced financial hubs. Residents enjoy direct access to a 2 km Green Loop, world-class retail at Zabeel Village, the Art Pavilion, Innovation Hub, and AI Campus â€” all connected by pedestrian-first boulevards and smart mobility networks.

beach.title: 2 km Green Loop & Wellness Trail
beach.description: Residents enjoy a pedestrian-only 2-kilometre wellness loop weaving through landscaped gardens, curated art installations, and open spaces â€” with 20% of the district dedicated to greenery and recreation.

community.title: World-Class Lifestyle & Leisure
community.description: From resort-style pools and a kids' splash pad to padel and squash courts, a fully equipped gym, yoga studio, and a 200-key boutique hotel with an exclusive members club â€” The Residences deliver five-star urban amenities.

tags.greenLoop: Access to a 2km Inner Circle (green walkways)
tags.retail: Curated premium retail and destination F&B
tags.familyPool: Family pool with kids' splash pad
tags.clubhouse: Clubhouse with gym and yoga studio

developer.titleSuffix: is the real estate arm of Dubai International Financial Centre
developer.description: DIFC Developments is the real estate development arm of Dubai International Financial Centre â€” one of the world's most advanced financial centres. With the Zabeel District masterplan valued at over AED 100 billion, DIFC Developments is creating a transformative live-work-play ecosystem spanning 17.7 million sq. ft. The district is designed to host 42,000+ companies and a workforce of 125,000+, integrating luxury residences, world-class retail, cultural landmarks, and cutting-edge innovation hubs into a single visionary urban community.

location.title: Location
location.description: Zabeel District is the ambitious new expansion of DIFC, strategically positioned at the crossroads of Dubai's most dynamic corridors. With direct links to the Museum of the Future, Dubai World Trade Centre, and the existing DIFC Gate District, residents enjoy unmatched connectivity to Downtown Dubai, Business Bay, and Dubai International Airport. The district features pedestrian-first boulevards, smart mobility systems, and over 1 million sq. ft. of curated retail and dining at Zabeel Village.

questions.question: What makes The Residences DIFC a unique investment opportunity?
questions.answer: The Residences DIFC is part of the Zabeel District â€” an AED 100+ billion masterplan expanding Dubai's leading financial centre. With only 463 residences in Phase A, freehold ownership open to all nationalities, and projected rental yields of 6â€“8% driven by high corporate tenancy demand from 42,000+ companies in DIFC, the project offers strong capital appreciation potential. Properties above AED 2M qualify for the UAE 10-year Golden Visa.

questions.question: What is the payment plan for The Residences DIFC?
questions.answer: The Residences DIFC offers a 70/30 payment plan: 5% down payment at booking, 65% in installments during the construction period, and the remaining 30% due at handover in Q4 2029. This structure allows buyers to manage payments over the construction timeline while securing a property in one of Dubai's most prestigious addresses.

questions.question: What types of residences are available and what are the sizes?
questions.answer: The project offers five residence types: 1-bedroom apartments from 846 sq. ft. (247 units), 2-bedroom apartments from 1,460 sq. ft. (164 units), 3-bedroom apartments from 1,898 sq. ft. (40 units), 3-bedroom duplex penthouses from 3,437 sq. ft. (6 units), and 4-bedroom duplex penthouses from 4,489 sq. ft. (6 units). Starting prices begin at AED 2.6 million for a 1-bedroom apartment.

questions.question: What amenities and lifestyle does Zabeel District offer?
questions.answer: Residents enjoy a 2 km Green Loop wellness trail, resort-style pools, padel and squash courts, a clubhouse with gym and yoga studio, and a 200-key boutique hotel with an exclusive members club. The district also features the Art Pavilion, the world's largest Innovation Hub, an AI Campus, over 1 million sq. ft. of retail at Zabeel Village, the expanded DIFC Academy, and pedestrian-first boulevards with curated dining and cultural spaces.

questions.question: How convenient is the location of The Residences DIFC?
questions.answer: The Residences DIFC enjoy a prime position within Zabeel District with direct links to the Museum of the Future and Dubai World Trade Centre. Downtown Dubai and Burj Khalifa are just 5 minutes away, Dubai Mall is within 5 minutes, and Dubai International Airport is reachable within 15 minutes. The district is connected via metro, the Dubai Future Loop Urban Walkway, and planned smart mobility networks including a suspended transport system.

termsAndConditions.termsIntro: By using this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please discontinue use.
termsAndConditions.section1Text: This website is owned and operated by an authorized channel partner, a licensed real estate brokerage based in Dubai, UAE. We are an authorized channel partner for the real estate projects promoted on this website. We are not the official developer, unless explicitly stated.
termsAndConditions.section2Text: This website is intended to provide general information about real estate projects. All information is subject to change without notice. You may not copy, distribute, or reproduce any content without written permission.
termsAndConditions.section3Text: While we strive to provide accurate and updated information, we do not guarantee the completeness or accuracy of the content. Prices, layouts, offers, and availability are subject to change by the developer or seller without prior notice.
termsAndConditions.section4Text: We are not liable for any direct or indirect losses resulting from your use of the site or reliance on its content. Final purchase decisions should be made after professional and legal consultation.
termsAndConditions.section5Text: This website may include links to third-party websites for your convenience. We do not endorse or take responsibility for the content, policies, or practices of these external sites.
termsAndConditions.section6Text: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms & Conditions at any time. Continued use of the website after changes indicates your acceptance of the revised terms.
termsAndConditions.section7Text: These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of the Emirate of Dubai and the United Arab Emirates.

privacyPolicy.section1Text: This Privacy Policy explains how this website ("we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, and protects the personal information you provide through our website. By using our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.section2Intro: When you submit your details on our website, we may collect the following information:
privacyPolicy.section3Intro: We use your personal information to:
section3List: Contact you regarding real estate projects and offers
Provide information about properties and services
Improve our services and website experience
privacyPolicy.cookiesNote: We may use cookies to enhance user experience and track website performance. You can disable cookies in your browser settings if you prefer.
privacyPolicy.section4Intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your data with:
section4List: Authorized developers or project owners, if required
CRM or marketing platforms used to follow up with leads
privacyPolicy.section5Text: Our website may contain links to developer or third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external websites.
section6List: Request access to your personal information
Request correction or deletion of your data
Withdraw your consent to receive marketing communications at any time by contacting us
privacyPolicy.section7Text: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any updates will be posted on this page.
privacyPolicy.section8Text: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or to exercise your data rights, please contact:
